text: CLOSE Brigitte Nielsen, star of ` ` Red Sonja'' and ` ` Beverly Hills Cop II,'' is going to be a mom again. Time Brigitte Nielsen, here in a 2010 photo, just welcomed her fifth child and first daughter. ( Photo : Frank Augstein, AP ) LOS ANGELES ( AP ) â€” Brigitte Nielsen says she has given birth at age 54. The model, actress and reality star and her 39 - year - old husband Mattia Dessi released a statement to People magazine Saturday saying their daughter Frida was born Friday in Los Angeles and weighed 5 pounds, 9 ounces ( 2. 3 kilograms ). It's the fifth child but first daughter for Nielsen, who has four adult sons from previous marriages. She married Dessi,
